text: wmin 'aezam ma yntfe bih almuminun al'infaq fi sabil allh. wamathal almuminin aladhin yunfiqun 'amwalahum fi sabil allah kamathal habat zuriet fi 'ard tybt, fa'iidha biha qad 'ukhrijat saqana tsheb minha sbe sheb, likuli wahidat snblt, fi kuli sunbulat miayat hb. wallah yudaeif alajr liman ysha', bhsb ma yaqum biqalb almnfq min al'iiman wal'iikhlas altam. wafadal allah wase, wahu subhanah ealim biman ysthqh, mutalie ealaa nyat ebadh
